sentences.en: At his coronation he received the homage of kings from Wales, Northumbria and Scotland.
sentences.cn: 在他的加冕典礼上，威尔士、诺森布里亚和苏格兰的国王向他宣誓效忠。

sentences.en: Homage was paid to the great sages buried in the city.
sentences.cn: 向安葬在此城市的圣哲们表示敬意.

sentences.en: I had a theoretical reverence and homage for beauty, elegance, gallantry, fascination.
sentences.cn: 我对于美 、 文雅 、 勇敢 、 魅力,抱有一种理论上的崇敬.

sentences.en: Kay could see how Michael stood to receive their homage.
sentences.cn: 恺可以看清楚迈克尔是怎么站在那儿接受他们的效忠的.

sentences.en: Many came to do the dead man homage.
sentences.cn: 许多人前来向死者致敬.

sentences.en: Mary came to pay homage to the dead man.
Palace has released two marvellous films that pay homage to our literary heritage.
sentences.cn: 皇宫影业公司发行了两部颂扬我们文学遗产的精彩影片。

sentences.en: She acknowledged their homage by bending her head, and giving them a quick look.
sentences.cn: 她点了点头, 瞥了他们一眼,表示领受.

sentences.en: So much homage at least the world paid to Russia.
sentences.cn: 于是,不管怎么样,世人还是向俄国表示高度敬意.

sentences.en: So of course I dashed impetuously to the shrine to pay homage.
sentences.cn: 一听这话,我当然性急地冲到这个神殿来表示敬意.

sentences.en: The film pays homage to Martin Scorsese’s ‘Mean Streets’.
sentences.cn: 该影片向马丁·斯科塞斯的《穷街陋巷》致敬。

sentences.en: The Imperial Guards presented homage to the king.
sentences.cn: 皇家警卫队向国王宣誓效忠.

sentences.en: The kings of France paid homage to no one.
sentences.cn: 法国国王不对任何人效忠。

sentences.en: They bowed in homage to the Unknown Soldiers.
sentences.cn: 他们向无名烈士墓鞠躬致敬.

sentences.en: We pay homage to the genius of Shakespeare.
sentences.cn: 我们对莎士比亚的天才表示敬仰.

trans.tran_en: something you do to show respect for someone or something you think is important
